summary:
This mod is based on Naitsirhc041995, Madmen Of The Reach -Forsworn Race mod.
The following change make this mod compatible and lore freindly with Requiem as well.

Endorse and comment!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#cc0000][size=4][i]    You want to know who the Forsworn are? We are the people who must pillage our own land. Burn our own ground. We are the scourge of the Nords. The axe that falls in the dark. The scream before the gods claim your soul. We are the true sons and daughters of the Reach."
    ―The Madmen of the Reach
[/i][/size][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ogb580n.jpg[/img]



[i]The Forsworn (also known as Witchmen of High Rock) are a clan of Reachmen who are mostly encountered throughout the highlands of the Reach. Part Breton and part Nord, the Reachmen are natives of the Reach who have been engaged in a centuries-old rebellion and bitter power struggle with the Nords of Skyrim for control of the province's western-most hold.
[/i]
[color=#ffd966]This mod adds the Forsworn race. [color=#ffd966]Forsworns are now friendly to you.[/color]

They are part breton, part nord, so naturally they have the abilities of both.


UPDATE version 1.2

Changes: Removed Dragonskin, remove smithing +5.

-Racial powers
 Forsworn are savage warriors making there enemies to flee. [color=#ffd966]Battle cry has a duration of 30 seconds[/color].

-Passives
25% resistant to frost
15% resistant to magic

-Skills
One-handed +10
Archery +5
Destruction +10
Sneak +5
Alchemy +5
Light Armor +5

There is also a [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70995?]requiem patch[/url] for it


I STRONGLY RECOMMEND TO USE
Master of Disguise
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]REQUIEM THE ROLEPLAY OVERHAUL


[/url][/color]
author: Vrennos
